# misc
future

# Scientific
matplotlib
seaborn
scikit-learn
pandas

# Jupyter and co
ipython
jupyter
jupyterlab
jupyterlab-widgets
ipywidgets

# Deep learning libraries
torch >= 2
torchvision
tensorboard >= 2.10
tensorflow >= 2.10;  platform_machine != "arm64" or sys_platform != "darwin"
tensorflow-macos >= 2.10; platform_machine == "arm64" and sys_platform == "darwin"
